snippet: Berkshire has long had the most expensive stock in the United States and on Thursday, they reached a high of $202,454.99.
abstract: Berkshire Hathaway Class A stock surpasses $200,000, defying critics who say shares of Warren Buffett's company have been overpriced for decades.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire has long had the most expensive stock in the United States and on Thursday, they reached a high of $202,454.99.

headline.main: A Berkshire Hathaway Stock Exceeds $200,000 a Share
headline.print_headline: A Berkshire Hathaway Stock Exceeds $200,000 a Share
